alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 4:29PM CDT until May 14 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Christian County in central Illinois... South central Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Divernon, or 9 miles northeast of Virden, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 4:23 PM, the public reported half dollar size hail in Chatham. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pawnee and Divernon around 445 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 88. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
